posts.post_content:
I like this card for two reasons:  
1. As opposed to [Silverglade Pathfinder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Silverglade Pathfinder) it's a one-drop.  
2. Its activated ability is based on the tutor card [Lay of the Land](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lay of the Land), therefore you don't get any card disadvantage from using it. It's similar to having "Basic landcycling ![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)" on one card in your hand.  
  
It might even be useful in Madness decks. It's not a [Wild Mongrel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wild Mongrel) of course, yet this could also find use to reduce the amount of lands in the deck. It's a risky move though in case it gets hosed.
